data.title: Lower & Middle School
data.text:
Shadow Visit

Prospective students are invited to participate in a full day shadow visit (for students entering 6th through 8th grade) or a half day visit (for students entering 1st through 5th grade). This is a wonderful opportunity to spend time connecting with current students, observing classes, and seeing firsthand what makes our lower and middle school so special!

Shadow Visits will begin in February 2024. To sign up for a shadow day, please contact the Admissions Office at admissions@nardin.org.

Visit

Nardin Academy is hosting in-person tours for prospective families. Please contact Director of Admissions, Leslie McSpadden, at 716.881.6262 x1380 or lmcspadden@nardin.org to schedule a tour.

Apply

The admissions office uses rolling admission for the Lower and Middle Schools. Submit your online application to the school, along with a non-refundable application fee of $50.

Apply to Nardin

Testing

All students wishing to attend Nardin must complete testing with one of our teachers. Testing can be done on our Lower & Middle School testing day on Saturday, March 2, 2024, or can be arranged for an alternate date as needed. Please contact the Admissions Office at admissions@nardin.org to schedule a testing date.

Recommendations

Submit the required recommendations, as identified in the online application. These forms will be found in your online Nardin account once you apply.
